input_data.title: Hijack
input_data.overview: When Flight KA29 is hijacked during its seven-hour journey from Dubai to London, Sam Nelson—an accomplished corporate negotiator—tries using his professional skills to save everyone on board. Will this high-risk strategy be his undoing?

response.analytical_summary: Hijack is a tense, real-time thriller centered on a corporate negotiator who takes matters into his own hands when his flight is hijacked. The series distinguishes itself through its focus on a single, extended crisis, eschewing traditional episodic structures. It explores themes of control, risk assessment, and the psychological toll of high-pressure situations, offering a gripping and suspenseful viewing experience driven by character interaction and strategic maneuvering rather than action sequences. The narrative unfolds with a sense of immediacy, placing the audience directly within the escalating crisis.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Sam Nelson, a skilled corporate negotiator, boarding Flight KA29 from Dubai to London. Shortly after takeoff, the plane is hijacked by a group with unknown motives. Recognizing the ineffectiveness of the official response, Sam decides to leverage his negotiation expertise to try and resolve the situation himself, communicating with the authorities and the hijackers through a single, trusted contact on the ground. As the flight progresses, Sam’s strategies become increasingly risky, requiring him to manipulate both the hijackers and the authorities to maintain control and buy time. He uncovers layers of complexity within the hijackers' plan, revealing a broader conspiracy that extends beyond the immediate threat to the plane. The series follows Sam’s desperate attempts to outwit his adversaries, navigate the conflicting agendas of those involved, and ultimately secure the safety of the passengers and crew, all while facing the potential consequences of his own actions. The unfolding events reveal that Sam’s past experiences and professional life are intricately linked to the hijacking, adding a personal stake to his efforts.
response.keyword_sentence: Hijack is a tense, suspenseful thriller set aboard an airplane, following a resourceful corporate negotiator as he navigates a high-stakes hostage situation and uncovers a broader conspiracy.
